name.ja: ハーピィの<ruby>羽<rt>は</rt></ruby><ruby>根<rt>ね</rt></ruby><ruby>嵐<rt>あらし</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal Summons a monster, shuffle 2 "Harpie Lady" and/or "Harpie Ladies" from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: Destroy that Normal Summoned monster. Then, if you shuffled a Normal Monster into the Deck to meet the requirement, you can change the battle position of 1 monster on your opponent's field (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position).
